main event: Radar detected a blip, the size of a quarter, that was labeled as a 'UFO'. The object moved with jerky movements and gradually diminished in size.
interesting points: The radar blip was described as the size of a quarter.
The object moved with jerky movements.
The object gradually diminished in size.
The report mentions that the date-time group was lost.
The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes.
